General_Description: '''The Athenian Weapon''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[Marksman|marksmen]] are far too dangerous to be left alive."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra slew Athenian Marksmen throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Deadly Precision]] and [[Target of Choice - Athenian Marksmen]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
